metadata.title: RHSA-2023:7438: Red Hat OpenStack Platform 17.1.1 (python-gevent) security update (Important)
metadata.description:
gevent is a coroutine-based Python networking library that uses greenlet to provide a high-level synchronous API on top of libevent event loop.

Security Fix(es):

* python-gevent: privilege escalation via a crafted script to the WSGIServer component (CVE-2023-41419)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: python-gevent: privilege escalation via a crafted script to the WSGIServer component

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
python3-gevent is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
